To access the dark web, you'll need to use the Tor network. Here's a simple guide on how to do it:

1. Download and install the Tor browser from the official Tor Project website (https://www.torproject.org/). The Tor browser is available for Windows, MacOS, Linux, and Android.

2. Once installed, open the Tor browser. It looks and works just like any other web browser, but all your internet traffic is automatically routed through the Tor network.

3. To access dark web sites, you'll need their .onion URLs. These are unique to the Tor network and cannot be accessed using regular web browsers. You can find .onion URLs on dark web forums, hidden wikis, or by searching online.

4. In the Tor browser, type the .onion URL in the address bar and press Enter. The dark web site should now load.

Remember, the dark web can be a dangerous place, full of illegal activities and scams. Always exercise caution and use common sense when accessing and interacting with dark web sites.
